descr: "Defines the characteristics of a message that can be shared between systems, including the type of event that initiates the message, the content to be transmitted and what response(s), if any, are permitted."

fields.name: message
fields.descr: "A reference to the message definition that must be adhered to by this supported response."

fields.name: situation
fields.descr: "Provides a description of the circumstances in which this response should be used (as opposed to one of the alternative responses)."
